fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util

Class MipMapMask

  • Object
    • MipMapMask

  • public class MipMapMask
extends Object
    Author:
    JeT Image pyramids containing only black and white pixel counts. level 0 is the full image scaled to the closest greater power of two. level one is half size, etc. each cell contains a number of black & white points level getMipmapNbLevels()-1 has only one pixel image image at level 0 has (2^(nbLevels-1))Â² pixels
